name: pipi linja
description:
sina pipi. o linja pona.

"r" to restart a level

"p" to skip a level

undo will be added in a future update :)

music by autonixia -
musi kalama li tan jan Kule (autonixia) -
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvn05Ujxj8SoZTrkmnmNVNw

sitelen open li tan waso mu -
https://waso-mu.neocities.org/ https://waso-mu.itch.io/

other pixel art and sfx by me
sitelen ante en mu li tan waso Wen (mi)

a cute little puzzle game inspired by baba is you and other thinky sokoban-likes
